mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from public.pay_details_input
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into public.pay_details_input (pay_details_input_id, basic_pay, position_pay, qualification_pay, housing_pay, family_pay, others_pay, transport_fee, total_pay, health_insurance, hand_input1, welfare_insurance, hand_input2, employ_insurance, hand_input3, total_insurance, income_tax, living_tax, total_deductible_amount, subscription_amount ) values (#{payDetailsInputId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{basicPay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{positionPay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{qualificationPay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{housingPay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{familyPay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{othersPay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transportFee,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalPay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{healthInsurance,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{handInput1,jdbcType=BIT}, #{welfareInsurance,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{handInput2,jdbcType=BIT}, #{employInsurance,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{handInput3,jdbcType=BIT}, #{totalInsurance,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{incomeTax,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{livingTax,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalDeductibleAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{subscriptionAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
